item.title: Libspng - C Language Case Study
item.description: Build System It uses meson build system to build the library Data Structures It is not using any fancy data structures instead it relies on plain array of objects and uses the traditional realloc function to expand them. Miscellaneous All variables are declared as when needed. This deviates from Linux source code. In Linux kernel, declarations are done only in the beginning of a new scope (either at the start of the function or start of a scope)
